---
title: Reproducible Tools Comparison
classoption: landscape
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(magrittr)
```

Below are two tables in which we've compiled information about our tools and other reproducibility tools for R.

## Table Comparing Reproducibility Tools

```{r}
dt1 <- read.csv("beRi - Comparing Tools - Publish1.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
kableExtra::kable(dt1) %>% kableExtra::row_spec(0,bold=TRUE) %>% 
  kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"))
```

## Table Comparing Project Specifications

```{r}
dt2 <- read.csv("beRi - Comparing Tools - Publish2.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
kableExtra::kable(dt2) %>% kableExtra::row_spec(0,bold=TRUE) %>% 
  kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"))
```
